titles.title: Early Pell Promise Act
A bill to establish an Early Federal Pell Grant Commitment Program.
Early Pell Promise Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Early Pell Promise Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Education to carry out an Early Federal Pell Grant Commitment Program under which low-income students in the eighth grade may be provided early commitments to receive grants.
